name: Memoria Café
description:
A home between dimensions for all who are lost.
A quiet place for those who wish to rest. 🍵 🍵 🍵

  Mind Menders are studious wizards who delve into the depths of troubled minds to dispel phobias, insomnias, obsessions and the like. Coffee boy Alis would like nothing more than to become one....But that's hard when you're bussing tables all day!

  All too eager, Alis scoops up the first job he can get-- An exhausted schoolgirl who can't get a wink of sleep. Easy, right? But the wannabe wizard learns quickly that this sleepy schoolgirl has more on her mind than she lets on.

Includes:

  • Visual novel style investigation
  • A tremendous amount of laser beams
  • Puzzles!
  • Possibly fire
  • Wow, that's a lot of fire
  • Minimum wage
Join us, huhuhuhu...! 🐭
This game is best played with an Xbox/Playstation controller. However, it's still fully playable with a mouse too!
